name: H1_RTX
description:
A deadly computer virus started spreading through computers. Our protagonist ends up sucked into his own computer. Try to hide from the abominations within and find the end of the connection to get back home.

For an optimal experience, please use headphones.

This game can be played with a gamepad or with a keyboard. No mouse is needed.

Controls:

WASD/left joystick: move

Space/A button: interact

F/B button: Use items collected.

Team Pain À l'Ail

Thomas Bergeron - Developer

Antoine Tremblay-Simard: Developer

Mattys Gervais: Developer

Angélique Dubé: Sprite Artist

Marie-Jeanne Cormier: Sprite Artist

Simon Bergeron: Sound director/producer

Simon-Olivier Germain-Fortin: Unpaid Intern

Submission for WonderJam Fall 2021

Themes: Horror, Management, Stealth
